languages.text: "Во время вашего отсутствия хормейстером астропатов было принято астропатическое сообщение с Даргонуса. Речь... речь о моей семье. Род Версерианов обвиняется в измене династии фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Во время вашего отсутствия хормейстером было принято астропатическое сообщение с Даргонуса. Речь... речь о моей семье. Род Версерианов обвиняется в измене династии фон Валанциус".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "While you were away, the Choirmaster received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. It concerns... my family. The Werserians have been accused of treason against House von Valancius."

languages.text: “您不在的这段时间，唱诗大师收到了来自达戈努斯的星语信息。这件事情关乎……我的家族成员，有人指控韦尔森家族背叛了冯·瓦兰修斯家族。”
languages.original_text: "While you were away, the Choirmaster received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. It concerns... my family. The Werserians have been accused of treason against House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: “您不在的这段时间，唱诗大师收到了来自达戈努斯的星语信息。这件事情关乎……我的家族成员，有人指控韦尔森家族背叛了冯·瓦兰修斯家族。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Während Eurer Abwesenheit hat der Chormeister eine astropathische Nachricht von Dargonus erhalten. Sie betrifft ... meine Familie. Den Werserians wird vorgeworfen, Haus von Valancius verraten zu haben."
languages.original_text: "While you were away, the Choirmaster received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. It concerns... my family. The Werserians have been accused of treason against House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Während Eurer Abwesenheit hat der Chormeister eine astropathische Nachricht von Dargonus erhalten. Sie betrifft ... meine Familie. Den Werserians wird vorgeworfen, Haus von Valancius verraten zu haben."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Durante su ausencia, el maestro del Coro ha recibido un mensaje Astropático de Dargonus. Se trata de, eh... mi familia. Los Werserian han sido acusados de traición contra la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "While you were away, the Choirmaster received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. It concerns... my family. The Werserians have been accused of treason against House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: «Durante su ausencia, el maestro del Coro ha recibido un mensaje Astropático de Dargonus. Se trata de, eh... mi familia. Los Werserian han sido acusados de traición contra la casa von Valancius».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « En votre absence, le maître de chœur a reçu un message astropathique de Dargonus qui concerne... ma famille. Les Werserian sont accusés d'avoir trahi la maison von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "While you were away, the Choirmaster received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. It concerns... my family. The Werserians have been accused of treason against House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: « En votre absence, le maître de chœur a reçu un message astropathique de Dargonus qui concerne... ma famille. Les Werserian sont accusés d'avoir trahi la maison von Valancius. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが留守の間、クワイアーマスターがダルゴナスの感応通信官からメッセージを受け取りました。その…私の家族に関するものです。ウェルザリアン家がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に対する反逆罪に問われています」
languages.original_text: "While you were away, the Choirmaster received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. It concerns... my family. The Werserians have been accused of treason against House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが留守の間、クワイアーマスターがダルゴナスの感応通信官からメッセージを受け取りました。その…私の家族に関するものです。ウェルザリアン家がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に対する反逆罪に問われています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Siz yokken Zacchary Weisz, Dargonus'tan Astropatik mesaj aldı. Mesaj... Benim ailemle ilgiliydi. Werserian Hanesi mensupları, Von Valancius Hanesi'ne ihanet etmekle suçlanmış."
languages.original_text: "While you were away, the Choirmaster received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. It concerns... my family. The Werserians have been accused of treason against House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Siz yokken Zacchary Weisz, Dargonus'tan Astropatik bir mesaj aldı. Mesaj... Benim ailemle ilgiliydi. Werserian Hanesi mensupları, Von Valancius Hanesi'ne karşı ihanetle suçlanmış."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
